title: From the Nightly Shore
description: No one has ever gotten close enough to discover the secrets of Corbin White's troubling past. Not until he finds a group of other teens hiding supernatural abilities. They teach him how to see and manipulate the Rudin, the uncharted world of unseen energy, and how to fend off the terrifying beings that live there.But they don't have the answers he's seeking.What they do have is a deadly secret of their own.Now, Corbin must confront the living nightmares of his past, survive the betrayal of the friends he trusted, and face his role in the earth-shattering events of the future.Any hero can save the world but Corbin is the only one destined to destroy it.From the Nightly Shore is the first book in the White Raven Chronicles, a gripping series that will haunt your dreams and leave you questioning the boundaries of reality.
author: Charles Buechele
